answers.answer: Do you take statin medication to lower your cholesterol?

question: Healthy 51yo male experiencing nausea for a couple of weeks and most recently muscle aches and swollen ankles.Not abuser of alcohol, only occasional no medication regularly. Having MRI, endoscopy done. Very puzzled!
title: elevated liv enz + muscle ache+swollen ankles
